sense.name: A system of timekeeping that defines the beginning, length, and divisions of the year.
sense.examples: The Mayan calendar is still one of the most advanced systems. The Gregorian calendar defines a certain number of months.

sense.name: A physical representation of a timekeeping system.
sense.examples: I have you on my calendar for next Monday. The calendar hung on the wall in his office. I have a computer program to make calendars for printing.
